name: Daydreams
description:
Daydreams is an artistic game that is meant to abstractly show one person's experience with ADHD! Each level has a theme dealing with different struggles or heightened experiences one may have when living with ADHD. This game is meant to be entertaining and hopefully somewhat educational! To learn more about ADHD, please visit the DSM-5 for official info or speak with a mental health professional.

All art assets created by Aatifah George and special thanks to Evans Muzulu for his musical contribution!
